#include<stdio.h>
int con_message(char *);
int main()
{
    char mess[10000];
    int t,i,j,l;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        scanf("%s",mess);
        for(i=0;mess[i]!='\0';)
        {
            l=con_message(mess+i);
            i=i+l+1;
        }
        printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
int con_message(char *s)
{
    int j,num=0;
    for(j=0;j<=2;j++)
    {
       num=num*10 +(s[j]-'0');
       if((num>=65 && num<=90) ||(num>=97 &&num<=122) ||(num==32)){
        printf("%c",num);
        break;
        }
    }
    return j;
}
